item.title: Dynamic Menu in MAUI
item.description: Context The requirement here is to be able to add dynamic menu items to a MAUI app. The use case chosen here is of selection of a font from a list of fonts installed on the machine. The list of fonts is shows under a menu item in the menu bar. More on menu bar from the Microsoft documentation Approach Step 1: Mark up The component to be used here is the MenuBarItem.
